topic: Recognition of Credits and Academic Progress Inquiry
question: I would like to clarify some points regarding the recognition of credits for the Artificial Intelligence course and my study plan. Can you advise if it's possible to correct the assignment of this course to a more relevant one in my curriculum? Additionally, I have concerns about the duration of my master's program due to delays in recognition and my ability to meet the ECTS requirements since I can only take a limited course load. Is there any possibility for exceptions in my case?"
answer: Please contact the recognition team regarding the credit assignment. For your academic progress, you are welcome to attend our open consultation hours for further assistance.
